description.translate: Unlucky is the one who will wear this. A futal that stinks.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§2Trépas du marcheur blanc\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Malchanceux celui qui portera ceci.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Un futal qui pue quoi.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Unlucky is the one who will wear this.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7A futal that stinks.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a2 §7LUC§c-1\"}"]}}
